SEARCH
Package hms.utils

Class DateConverter

java.lang.Object
hms.utils.DateConverter
public class DateConverter extends Object
Provides utility methods for handling date conversions and age calculations based on dates.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static int
    calculateAge(LocalDate birthDate)
    Calculates the age in years based on a given birth date up to the current date.
    static LocalDate
    convertDate(String date)
    Converts a string representing a date in ISO-8601 format (e.g., "yyyy-MM-dd") into a LocalDate object.

  • Constructor Details

    • DateConverter

      public DateConverter()

  • Method Details

    • calculateAge

      public static int calculateAge(LocalDate birthDate)
      Calculates the age in years based on a given birth date up to the current date. If the birth date provided is after the current date, it throws an IllegalArgumentException.
      Parameters:
      birthDate - The birth date to calculate the age from.
      Returns:
      The calculated age in years.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the birth date is in the future.

    • convertDate

      public static LocalDate convertDate(String date)
      Converts a string representing a date in ISO-8601 format (e.g., "yyyy-MM-dd") into a LocalDate object.
      Parameters:
      date - The string representation of the date to be converted.
      Returns:
      The LocalDate object corresponding to the input string.
      Throws:
      DateTimeParseException - If the text cannot be parsed or the format is not valid.
